What We Offer

End-to-End Manufacturing

From concept to cartridge, we handle every step of the physical production process. A magical blend of passion and production.

Homebrews for real hardware

Cartridge Production

Custom PCB design and assembly for NES, SNES, Game Boy, Genesis and more. We help you bring yours to life too.

Dream project with no vessel?

Packaging & Boxes

Professional retail boxes, clamshell cases, and custom packaging. We craft, print, and forge what's missing, then make it yours.

Complete the experience

Manuals & Inserts

Full-color instruction manuals, warranty cards, and promotional inserts. Various sizes and paper options.

Premium presentation

Label Printing

High-quality cartridge labels with glossy or matte finishes. Weatherproof and fade-resistant for lasting quality.

Built to last

QA & Testing

Every unit tested on original hardware. Compatibility verified across different console revisions. Premium quality guaranteed.

Delivered with care

Fulfillment

Worldwide shipping with tracking. We can ship directly to your customers or in bulk to you. Built for play, delivered with care.

How It Works

From ROM to Retail

A streamlined process designed to get your game into players' hands with minimal hassle. We handle the complexity so you can focus on your game.

Step 1

Request a Quote

Tell us about your game, platform, and desired run size. We will provide a detailed estimate within 24 hours. No commitment required.

Step 2

Design & Proofs

Work with our design team on labels, manuals, and packaging. We provide digital proofs for your approval. Your vision, our expertise.

Step 3

Production

PCB assembly, cartridge programming, label application, and packaging assembly. Full quality control at every step. Built with care.

Step 4

Testing

Every unit tested on original hardware. We verify functionality, save compatibility, and visual quality. Premium quality guaranteed.

Step 5

Delivery

Shipped to you or directly to your customers. Worldwide delivery with tracking and insurance. Delivered with care, built for play.

Step 6

Ongoing Support

We stand behind our work. If any issues arise, we are here to help with replacements or troubleshooting. Your success is our success.
